Forms with Invasive Bladder Cancer
							                    Treatment of urethral cancer that forms at the same time as invasive bladder cancer may include the following:         -  Surgery (cystourethrectomy in women, or urethrectomy and cystoprostatectomy in men).        If the urethra is not removed during surgery to remove the bladder, treatment may include the following:         -  Active surveillance.
